column2: "That's quite the long face you have, my lady. Are you dissatisfied with that little fact I mentioned earlier?"
"Of course...! This all started because you Photoners created the Darkers...!"
"However, my lady, it was Xion who signed off on and approved of the creation of the source of all Darkers, the [Profound Darkness]."
"She must have realized it back then. With her computational abilities, she would have been able to see into the future to some extent."
"What the [Profound Darkness]'s creation would do to the Photoners, that is. She must have known."
"We Photoners lost our ability to use Photons in the battle against the [Profound Darkness], and so we created ARKS to use them for us."
"The [Profound Darkness] was sealed away, but the Dark Falz remained."
"And so, from that day unto this, ARKS have battled the Darkers. And what a pointless battle it has been."
"It's not pointless!"
"No, my lady, it is pointless."
"...The Dark Falz are individuals, and each has its own desires."
"Those desires are influenced by their hosts, becoming corrupted by them."
"[Elder] should be fairly easy to understand, I think? The host's influence was so strong, it forgot its original purpose, instead seeking only conflict for conflict's sake."

"[Apprentice] is the same. [Loser]...
Well, I didn't change much."
"However, [Double] is different. [Double] wields its power only for its one true purpose."
"True purpose...?"
"That purpose is nothing less than the revival of the [Profound Darkness]."
"The quickest way to revive the [Profound Darkness] is for it to consume all the other Dark Falz."
"In so doing, it will gather Darker Factor equivalent to the [Profound Darkness], and in short order it will awaken from its long slumber."
"Need I remind you, [Double] has already eaten [Apprentice] and [Loser]. By now, it has even consumed [Elder] as well."
"The countdown has already begun."
"The countdown until the [Profound Darkness] revives and annihilates this world, that is."
"1. Then we'll defeat the [Profound Darkness]."
"2. We'll destroy [Double] before that happens."
"The [Profound Darkness] is the source of all Dark Falz. Do you understand what that means? It can create as many Falz as it likes."
"If you're struggling with just one [Double], you don't stand a chance against a horde of them."
"Yes, that's probably the only way. If the [Profound Darkness] is revived, it will create more Dark Falz."
"If you're struggling with just one [Double], you wouldn't stand a chance against a horde of them."
"But don't forget, you're currently trapped within Dark Falz [Double]'s stomach."
"I don't get it. Just what is the [Profound Darkness]? Why would someone create that?"
"The [Profound Darkness] is an imitation of Xion. A man-made Akashic Record created by the Photoners."
"An artificial Akashic Record created to calculate and administer all things, a tool of convenience to enable mankind's sloth."

"But our great civilization was well into its decline...
Mankind's apathy, along with their other negative emotions, seeped into the creation process."
"Photons are very receptive to strong emotions. The greater in number they are, the more radical the effect is on the energy they produce."
"Thus they found they had created the [Profound Darkness]. The embodiment of all negative emotions, and sire to the Darkers, who sought to destroy all that exists."
"You asked an interesting question, my lady. Why was it created? I'd rather like to hear the answer to that myself."
"Why didn't she stop its creation, despite foreseeing such destruction?"
"But now, I feel I can understand her just a little."

"If I had to guess, I would say...
I would say she was lonely."
